sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHACK, in ancient cuſtoms, a liberty of winter- paſturage. In the counties of Norfolk and Suffolk, the lord of the manor has ſhack, i, e. a liberty of feeding his ſheep at pleaſure in his tenants lands during the six winter months. In Norfolk, ſhack also extends to the common for hogs, in all men’s grounds, from the end of harveſt till ſeed-time. Whence to go a-shack, is to feed at large.
